      • getShowTime

        public miniprj.ShowTimeItems getShowTime​(java.lang.String movie,
                                         java.lang.String cineplex,
                                         java.lang.String cinema,
                                         java.lang.String date,
                                         java.lang.String timing)
        Gets the show times based on the one selected by the user.
        Parameters:
        movie - The movie chosen by the user.
        cineplex - The cineplex based on the selected cineplex.
        cinema - The cinema based on the chosen cineplex.
        date - The date chosen by the user.
        timing - The timing chosen by the user.
        Returns:
        the show time based on the parameters.
